name: QuestDB
semantic_context: Get, add and update data in QuestDB
natural_language_description: 这是 QuestDB 节点。主要用于: Get, add and update data in QuestDB

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: insert
available_options: Execute Query (值: executeQuery) - Executes a SQL query
Insert (值: insert) - Insert rows in database

query.name: query
query.description: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters.
query.natural_language_description: 参数名: Query | 作用: The SQL query to execute. You can use n8n expressions or $1 and $2 in conjunction with query parameters. | (必填项)

schema.name: schema
schema.description: Name of the schema the table belongs to
schema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema | 作用: Name of the schema the table belongs to

table.name: table
table.description: Name of the table in which to insert data to
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 作用: Name of the table in which to insert data to | (必填项)

columns.name: columns
columns.description: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 作用: Comma-separated list of the properties which should used as columns for the new rows

returnFields.name: returnFields
returnFields.description: Comma-separated list of the fields that the operation will return
returnFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return Fields | 作用: Comma-separated list of the fields that the operation will return | 默认值: *

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
